MCO Must-Gather Report
======================

This directory contains sensitive information from the Machine Config Operator.

Files included:
- MachineConfig resources with file contents and systemd units
- ControllerConfig with registry secrets and CA data
- Node logs and diagnostic information

WARNING: This data may contain:
- SSH private keys
- Registry pull secrets
- Internal certificates
- Database passwords
- API tokens

Please handle with care and sanitize before sharing.

Contact: admin@example.com
Support: https://support.example.com/mco
